bibl.title: G.D. KILPATRICK, The Principles and Practice of New Testament Textual Criticism. Collected Essays
bibl.note: Reproduit de: Neutestamentliche Aufsätze. Festschrift für Prof. Josef Schmid (Regensburg, 1963) pp. 125-137. - Uses the papyrological evidence (in part. P45, P66 and P75).
KILPATRICK G.D., Atticism and the Text of the Greek New Testament.
G.D. KILPATRICK, The Principles and Practice of New Testament Textual Criticism. Collected Essays (Leuven, 1990) pp. 15-32.
